biotools.summary: Collection of tools for the analysis of microarray data. It includes tools for data pre-processing, clustering, differential gene expression, predictors, array CGH and functional annotation. A new pipeline module allows for automation of sequential analysis steps.

bioschemas.name: GEPAS
